name: MintGate
intro: Solution for anyone to build their community on their own platform
introduce: MintGate is a platform to create, distribute, and use NFTs to manage membership perks around communities. MintGate enables creators and brands to create their personally branded whitelabel NFT storefronts with in-app token gated content streaming. They have also built a series of widgets and APIs that enable the creation of token gated links.
